website_summaries.verdict: Hospital-grade athletic tape that is safe for sensitive skin
pros: Hospital grade ultra lightweight cotton is breathable and ultra adhesive
Works to prevent injuries like sprains when used as a preventative measure
Zigzag edges make it easy to rip
Comes with its own carrying case

customer_reviews.title: It was quite difficult to put it on the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: It was quite difficult to put it on the handle and the lack of instructions does not help. I've manage to put it but I'm not still aware how it would be in playing. I would not have written a premature review but I was pushed so hard that yielded. I actually already played with it. And I have to say it is not good. It makes slippery, the grief, and also quite thorny on the palm. In general for this price I should have not expected much, but it was recommended by Amazon and the sellers seemed so excited with their product so I was surprised to discover how poorly it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitar Kambourov

customer_reviews.title: Cures Heel Fat Pad Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second box. I use it on my heels to cure heel fat pad syndrome. I thought I had plantar facetious but after much research and such I found taping my heels to compress my fat pads fixed it. This stuff is good. Could be a little more sticky since feet sweet and move from running but it still works well. Don’t try to use scissors just tear it with dry hands.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.... but not that good either.
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Been taping ankles for several years now. I found his tape is difficult to use. PROS: It folds over itself very easily when trying to wrap around curved surfaces It is not very adhesive. When wrapping ankles I had to hold in place at times until I wrapped a piece of supporting tape around it. CONS: Tears very easily when wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: TimmyTuna

customer_reviews.title: Great gymnastics tape!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tape for my daughter last year and when she needed more, she without a doubt, requested the same tape. She loves the easy ability to rip the tape to the correct size without undo work. Highly recommend for gymnastics athletic tape.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maycroft

customer_reviews.title: Basically does not stick to skin.
customer_reviews.text: Tears easily, as intended. Sturdy and unlikely to break where you don't want it to. Close to ZERO stick on skin. If you wrap around your body two full times, it sticks to itself well enough, but still not great. The end can peel up even if you wrap two full revolutions, and it's prone to rolling up if that happens. It sticks FAR worse than the budget brand tape I bought from Walmart. , though admittedly the structural integrity is a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fox

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, dependable support, no scissors needed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had sent my husband a box of this tape a few months ago for wrapping his wrists for support. He had used all but one roll so I purchased this box. Very good tape and works like a charm. (He had carpal tunnel surgery a while back and does heavy lifting on the job.). My daughter uses it on her hands in jujitsu. Great product, comfortable, breathable, and a definite help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no residue after removing it
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Journeyman Bricklayer and his fingers after all these years probably have no print left on them. He started wrapping his fingers with sports tape and it has helped tremendously. No sticky residue with this brand is even better. He says this is the best tape thus far that he's used.
customer_reviews.author: CC Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Good so far but...
customer_reviews.text: The tape itself is great so far. Granted, I've only used it for one practice so I will have to see if I continue liking it so much I have an injury prone ankle that really enjoys rolling. This tape had definitely helped with prevention so far. However, I was pretty disappointed to find that the bag it was supposed to include, wasn't included at all! I store my tape in my Taekwondo bag, so it tends to get messy or stick to strings and I was really looking forward to having a separate little bag to put it in so it would stay cleaner and be easier to find.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gates

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product, easier than your average athletic tape to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, easier than your average athletic tape to use, thanks to the ease with which you can tear the tape. The perforations are a plus as this allows air flow to the skin. I am training for a GoRuck and have some arch issues. By taping up both feet it provides relief, and support when I'm doing 5 mile rucks with 60lbs. on my back three times a week. The packaging is excellent, not bulky, so I can easily store the extras in a small drawer, plus there is a bonus nylon carry bag for a roll or two when you need that tape on the go...Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Badinspector

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Waste of Time and Money. Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait awhile after buying this to write a review. So here it goes. Do not waste your money on this tape. It does not stick to anything and come off within minutes of application. Does not matter how many times you wrap or how clean or dirty the surface is. This tape is absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It does the job fine.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to wrap around my wrists. It does the job just fine. I like the fabric on JJ Coach sport tape more. But for the price, i am happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Don D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as other brands.
customer_reviews.text: We've had better sports tape that we purchased from CVS. My son wasn't a fan of it. He said it didn't stick well. He used it to tape up his thumb and fingers for goalkeeping. He mentioned it just didn't feel as comfortable as the CVS Brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perry Moraja: Award Winning Author

customer_reviews.title: Tape usage for dancing en pointe
customer_reviews.text: As a first-time user of athletic tape, I found that it is very easy and straight forward as to how to rip and apply the tape to the needed area. Because I wear the tape during my pointe classes in ballet, I have applied the tape to wear the pointe shoe rubs against the side of my foot and where I have been prone to get blisters. So far after two week’s usage of this tape, it has made it much more comfortable to dance en pointe and my blisters have been protected from any further damage or discomfort! Shipping was also expedited!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Athletic tape that works.
customer_reviews.text: Having tried a few athletic tape brands now, Drop Skip Tape has a few notable characteristics; 1) More flexible (more stretch) than other brands I've tried. 2) Leaves no sticky residue after you remove it which is great. The adhesive is strong, not the strongest I've used, but the fact it leaves no annoying residue is awesome. 3) More breathable than other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: William Mainaga

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, great value
customer_reviews.text: Tape is awesome at staying on when you want it to be there, tears nicely when you're cutting it to length, has good elasticity when you're wrapping, and comes off with not too much sting. My go-to tape for restraining my wrists while climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love this tape!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tape is fantastic! I use it to tape my wrist every time I go to the gym, and it works fabulously. It stays put and provides plenty of support. It is very easy to tear and also easy to take off. In addition, it does not leave a sticky residue on my wrist afterwards, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: WheeMomma

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! This is my first time needing sports ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! This is my first time needing sports tape due to a wrist injury. I sprained it recently and have been out of the gym for a while. Once I got back in and tried this out it was amazing! No soreness whatsoever the next day and it didn't sweat off. I'm in love with this tape and I'll definitely be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough by itself
customer_reviews.text: Tears by hand well. Breathable. Doesn't leave any glue residue behind after you remove it. Only complaint is that I have been using it to treat posterior shins splints and have to pull it pretty tight while applying, and the ends will start to come unstuck from my skin after awhile. I wear compression sleeves over it to keep the tape in place and it has helped with the pain tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: this tape does exactly what you want athletic tape to do. you'll notice it feels a little different, maybe a little softer to the tough and maybe a little lighter. I can't comment on it's claim to be breathable as I had it over a wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Was just as good as the best reviews. For the people who did not like it, do not know what they are saying. This stuff is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Robust Solution for Weak Ankle
customer_reviews.text: I have used Drop Skip several times now and find it strong and meets my need to support a surgically repaired ankle. I use a gauze wrap and then tightly wrap that over with several turns of tape. The gauze allows me to use surgical scissors to easily cut off the wrap. I was attracted by the price - a real bargain. Great solution~!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tape!
customer_reviews.text: It is very good tape. Good quality , no allergy issued. (I am allergy with most of tape even medical grade).I hope the company can make KT tape. ( Not recommended for tennis players who use it for wrist protection. )
customer_reviews.author: Dolce, Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This tape is fantastic! Doesn't come off when it gets sweaty but ...
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who uses athletic tape knows 1. how important it can be to your training sessions and 2. what a pain it is to get the sticky residue off afterwards. This tape is fantastic! Doesn't come off when it gets sweaty but when you take it off there is nothing left behind. The handwritten thank you note in the package was a great touch as well. As a CrossFit Gym owner I put a lot of stock in the addition of a personal touch. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pietragallo

customer_reviews.title: BEST ATHLETIC TAPE EVER ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: This athletic tape is AMAZING. I have used other athletic tape that caused me to sweat, and eventually falls apart. Other tapes have required me to re-wrap throughout the day. Dropskin goes on, allows your body to breath and lasts longer than any other tape I have used. A friend of mine told me about this product after I had gone through 5 other products. Now that I have found Dropskin, I never have to search for a better athletic tape again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron james saul

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a house full of athletes
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive tape is easy to use and cut, and a great value when you consider the number of rolls in the box for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JC Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for taping up your hands
customer_reviews.text: Perfect athletic tape for taping up my hands for a nice go at the heavy bag. Definitely helped to reduce busting and bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use completely.
customer_reviews.text: In using the tape it initially unrolled easily, but as more was used the remaining tape became increasingly difficult to unroll to the point that tape remaining on each roll was discarded because it was not possible to unroll it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use tape
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use strong tape to prevent or heal sports injuries.
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Wechsler

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great vendor.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a Brazilian Jiu Jitsu coach and goes through this tape like crazy; it is THE best deal for the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchashing this tape, the first time around it worked great so I hoping for the same quality this time as well. I will update when I start using it
customer_reviews.author: P. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Well...
customer_reviews.text: I am a ballerina and I need to cover my toes in order to avoid blisters and cuts while in my point shoes. I had a lot of hope in this product, but, it just doesn’t stick to the skin it will only sticks to itself.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Santana

customer_reviews.title: I just order it but the clinic has not said anything bad that they didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to do with the tape, I just order it but the clinic has not said anything bad that they didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: ... use tape for my ankles and it can be pretty expensive. These are nice in that they tear ...
customer_reviews.text: I use tape for my ankles and it can be pretty expensive. These are nice in that they tear much easier than normal athletic tape but is just as strong. The pouch is silly, I hold 1 roll of tape.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Bowlers! Consider this as alternative to fixed (and sometimes clumsy) wrist band.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my wrist for bowling, and so far, so good. I've discovered, the hard way, that some sort of under-wrapping (or pre-wrap?) will be beneficial for removal (I suspected, but tried with just tape the first time, youch!). To me, using tape is better than wrist braces made specifically for bowling as the tape is snug on the wrist, and stabilizes the wrist while allowing movement, and does not hamper my grip.
customer_reviews.author: John R Cheeseman

customer_reviews.title: The tape works great. Although I wish I didn't have to use ...
customer_reviews.text: The tape works great. Although I wish I didn't have to use it. I tape my left foot every day for plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tape is pretty good. Glue doesn't adhere to the skin when ...
customer_reviews.text: This tape is pretty good. Glue doesn't adhere to the skin when tape is removed. Although it's a bit expensive in my opinion. Would be great if they could offer it in larger quantities (say 20 or more) at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: ViKING

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for those who need to use athletic tape ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for those who need to use athletic tape on a regular basis. It's strong but flexible, easy to apply and the corrugated edge enables tearing the tape from the roll without a knife or scissors. Adhesion is good and tape can be applied directly to the skin without causing irritation on removal.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice tape, but needs more adhesive
customer_reviews.text: The tape is nice and soft but I wish it was more sticky. The adhesive isn't that strong and kept unraveling. I used this on posting my dogs ears because it was latex free, breathable, and has some give.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Good tape - packaging is horrible for the environment
customer_reviews.text: 2 large plastic trays hold the tape. No recycling # on the plastic and the plastic itself is completely unnecessary - use fiber trays! Also the enclosed plastic bag should be in a different, environmentally friendly material.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place until you want to remove
customer_reviews.text: Tape stays in place wrapped around fingers and does not loosen due to sweat. Removes easily after job is finished with little if any residue.
customer_reviews.author: robosolo

customer_reviews.title: Good athletic tape
customer_reviews.text: From other sources I've purchased some poor quality athletic tape, and this stuff surpasses that. Seems like a durable and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Tape is great quality for great price. Quite a bit less expensive than in a sports or pharmacy store. I will re-order when we run out.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Prine

customer_reviews.title: doesn't have great adhesive. I bought this for wrestling practice and ...
customer_reviews.text: doesn't have great adhesive. I bought this for wrestling practice and it doesn't stay on with sweat. I wouldn't buy this again. UPDATE - i bumped this from one star to three stars based solely on customer service
customer_reviews.author: Tom Redmond

customer_reviews.title: We can count on Amazon to have so many choices available!
customer_reviews.text: The product is for my husband. He plays Pickleball on a daily basis and uses it on his feet for support and to avoid painful steps. He loves it and is very happy to find it available. The 'quick' delivery is also a plus! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra M.

customer_reviews.title: The tape tears easily but is a little too flexible for my liking
customer_reviews.text: The tape tears easily but is a little too flexible for my liking. I tape my fingers for martial arts but this tape does not seem like it offers enough resistance because it is so stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Merhout

customer_reviews.title: Great tape. Holds well and most importantly
customer_reviews.text: Great tape. Holds well and most importantly, you can easily tear it. I bought this for my dad who has a bruised heal and needs to tape it before going hunting.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tape
customer_reviews.text: Amazing soft, breathable and yet durable tape. Used on my elbow to avoid tennis elbow during my tennis game, and it provided great support and stayed in place for more than 2 hrs. Just BUY and i promise you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: The tape is very easy to use and tear
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described and packaged smartly. The tape is very easy to use and tear. The last 30% of the roll is more difficult to pull from the roll than from a fresh roll but I think that has more to do with physics than the tape. Plantar Faciitus take that! Thanks for the tool to provide relief.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Balsinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great tape! Tough, doesn't come undone and leaves no sticky mess. I have found the perfect tape.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great tape. Use to wrap wrists and ankle for weight training. Easy to tear and good support. Only complaint about product is that the roll becomes tight toward the end. Makes it hard to wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: This tape works great! My daughter is a gymnast and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This tape works great! My daughter is a gymnast and I have to tape her ankle for every practice. It is easy to maneuver, rip and is durable. I am in love with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Leyva

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite tape I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have been taping my own ankles for soccer games going on about 4 years now. This is by far my favorite tape I have used. It is so easy to tear by hand and gets the job done perfectly. I won't ever use any other brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chad P.

customer_reviews.title: Stick together, with athletic tape!
customer_reviews.text: This tape works perfect. I have plantar fascitis and this helps a lot for added support. I will be buying another 6 pack when I use these up. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Chacho

customer_reviews.title: tape is good, very little residue yet stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Positive: tape is good, very little residue yet stays in place. bag is very useful and no need to use anything else to transport it ( like a plastic bag). Negative: Demand ZERO WASTE in the packaging! get rid of the plastic seperators, use cardboard instead. get in board or lose business.
customer_reviews.author: soundmap

customer_reviews.title: I even recommend it to my friends and they agree too
customer_reviews.text: Really is a product of its worth. Description spot on, no exaggeration, I even recommend it to my friends and they agree too. Will certainly come back. The only downside is it's adhesiveness does reduce at sweat, best to use and wrap with external enclosure (e.g. brace / socks)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great! Easy to tear and very flexible
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, works great! Easy to tear and very flexible. I'm actually using it to wrap my car steering wheel - the rubber is deteriorating and comes off on your hands when it's hot out, and this tape covers it up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this to any athlete
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to any athlete. I play volleyball at school and I use this tape all the time. It really helps when I get a finger jam or ankle sprain. From all the hits that my wrists and knees take, using this tape is a necessity. Its super easy to tear and doesn’t leave a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and so convenient. Comes with a pouch to carry a roll one the go.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nicer and more comfortable than some other stuff I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Nicer and more comfortable than some other stuff I've tried. I like that it is tearable by hand. It comes with a little bag, which is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can tear it with my fingers. Don't need scissors.
customer_reviews.author: The Doughboy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fractured her foot playing club soccer. Once she was cleared to play we needed a good tape to tape her foot with. This tape was exactly what we were looking for and it arrived very quickly. Thank you so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It has been fantastic. I use it to tape up my fingers for brazilian jiu jitsu. The tape is strong to help protect my fingers and it rips easily every time. Its everything i could have wanted. Will definitely buy again when i eventually run out.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and delivered quickly. Grandson loves hockey and goes through this tape frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Fl girl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well at a great cost. Easy to tear
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well at a great cost. Easy to tear, so no scissors needed. My 11-year old daughter uses this tape over pre-wrap, and under Elastikon to tape her ankle and Achilles for gymnastics practice every day.
customer_reviews.author: Silvers

customer_reviews.title: It could stick better.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it doesn’t stick well to itself. It depends on the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product for gymnastics !!!(great tape grips for rips on bars)!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape, it works very well for my gymnastics and is perfect for rips from/on uneven bars (tape grips). The tape is very easy to use and you don’t need scissors to use it. It’s also sticky enough to wear it stays in place on your while still be breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great tape for sports lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tape for my granddaughters rips from gymnastics. Great quantity and the quality of the tape I’d exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's OK but it doesn't seem to stick like other tapes I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Don McClean

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR TAPE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I use athletic tape for boxing all the time. Some tapes might not stick as well or come off during a fight or sparring, and that can never be good. I’ve noticed that this tape stays on pretty long and doesn’t come off because of my sweating. I love the fact that the glue is latex-free and doesn’t mess with my skin. Give this tape a go, I’m sure it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tap! It sticks well, stays put and it is so soft! Very comfortable to wear, definitely will be a costumer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: does the job, great price
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, works as well as higher priced tape, good for joint taping to keep you training and in the game
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: The tape was purchased for my grandsons sports team and ...
customer_reviews.text: The tape was purchased for my grandsons sports team and have not heard but assume that it was well received. Arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put & Breathable
customer_reviews.text: Great athletic tape. Stays in place well and is definitely more breathable than other tapes we have used. Ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tape
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tape. Good quality and easy to tear with the zig zag edges. Holds well too. I've been using it primarily for shin splints. Packages well and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Miller

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The tape is much easier to tear with my hands than the brand that I had been using. It is also more pliable and cloth-like, and does not leave a residue when I remove it. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Shipper was fast and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Tape is wonderful. Nice and sticky, and yet stretchy, it works just the way it is supposed to and the way it is advertised. I will definitely be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Dry

customer_reviews.title: This Athletic tape is great! I use it for Jiu Jitsu training and ...
customer_reviews.text: This Athletic tape is great! I use it for Jiu Jitsu training and weight lifting, as I have arthritis in my wrist. It seems to support my wrist pretty well. I recommend this product to anyone looking for athletic tape.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin M. Hatzenbeller

customer_reviews.title: and very useful for everything I need
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, and very useful for everything I need. A great product and will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Tape is excellent. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Tape is excellent. Easy to use. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vince K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place and is easy to tear in a straight line. I wear it to protect my heals during hiking and long walks. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Honda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do at a great savings!!!
customer_reviews.author: kenny_1950

customer_reviews.title: Best tape by far
customer_reviews.text: Best tape I've used by far. Literally my 3rd order and now I'm a subscription
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Roche

customer_reviews.title: Easy on
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my ankle for basketball. Worked great. Easy to apply and easy to tear. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Good value and product -- sticky, flexible, and breathable. Used for taping my foot during a soccer game, and the tape worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tape
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality tape; easy to use; easy to tear, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Runners!
customer_reviews.text: This tape is very breathable, I noticed the pores on the tape as soon as I tore off the first piece. It stays on longer during my runs, I guess the pores helps get rid of extra moisture. Other tapes would slide off during my run and it got annoying to keep having to adjust it and apply more. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives a little more than I’m used to, not quite as stiff.works well tho
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gymnastics - easy to tear and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Great tape for a nice price. Easy to tear and holds well for gymnastics. Nice flexible fit. Definitely as good as Mueller and Cramer. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BeachParentSF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tape is great and tgebboys that it came in is perfet size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best athletic tape on he market
customer_reviews.text: Best tape by far! It doesn't stick to your skin and tears easily to the desired length. He tape is not stretchey amd is super supportive.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas gwoc

customer_reviews.title: Great tape!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to tear, long lasting and tough. Use these all the time when playing volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exaclty what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the tape I needed. Arrived quickly and just as promised. Would definitely order here again.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Sandidge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product quality and good pricing. This is a good quality, breathable sports tape that is both light and sturdy. Also easy to tear with limited threading which is important to me in a sports tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amizonfn101

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great low cost tape. Using to wrap hands for boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tape, perfect for wrapping my ankle and adding stability
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. The tape helped me manage the discomfort
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this tape the past few days for my tennis elbow, and I love it. The tape helped me manage the discomfort, which allows me to continue playing tennis. I’ve had some bad experiences with other brands but this one is a 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to tear and it doesn't fall apart once you ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is just what I expected as an athlete. It is easy to tear and it doesn't fall apart once you start sweating. The carrying bag is also perfect for when you carry it in your sports bag and don't want it to get dirty. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre Miralda

customer_reviews.title: I love this tape!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape! It's breathable and it sticks! I've had the hardest time finding a tape that stays in place and doesn't make my daughters skin feel itchy. We go through a lot of tape with her playing year-round soccer. I will definitely be ordering it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gorges-Lecuona

customer_reviews.title: Good soft cotton athletic tape!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Needed some soft cotton athletic tape with just enough adhesive and this fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Glennbob

customer_reviews.title: Tape is sturdy, flexible and adheres to skin but does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Tape is sturdy, flexible and adheres to skin but does not stay adhered to itself so it tends to unravel.
customer_reviews.author: GM

product_meta.title: Athletic Tape in White, Ultra Breathable Sports Tape, Zigzag Edge for Easy Tearing, 100% Hospital Grade Cotton, Latex Free zinc Oxide Adhesive, 1.5 inch x 33 feet, Free Pouch Included (6 Pack)
feature_bullets: 100% ULTRA BREATHABLE COTTON - Hospital grade material allows moisture created by intense activity to permeate the tape and avoid build up maximizing adhesion to skin.
STABILITY - Supports and maintains all your major joints; ankle, wrists, hands, thumb, knees, elbow, toes, feet, shoulder, achilles’ heel
PREVENTION - Helps prevent sprains, twists, and tweaks, during intense activity for maximum strength
LATEX FREE WITH ZIGZAG EDGE - Latex free zinc oxide adhesive. Easy to tear zigzag edge for easy, safe, and accurate tearing with no scissors required.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Our Athletic Tape is backed by a 100% guarantee that you will be completely satisfied with your product or get your money back.
